verses.text: And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and for their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, and for their \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, and for their \w officers|strong="H7860"\w*; and they \w presented|strong="H3320"\w* themselves \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w flood|strong="H5104"\w* in old \w time|strong="H5769"\w*, \add even\add* \w Terah|strong="H8646"\w*, the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, and the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Nachor|strong="H5152"\w*: and they \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

And I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* your \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* from the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w flood|strong="H5104"\w*, and \w led|strong="H3212"\w* him throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, and \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*.

And I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* and \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*: and I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it; but \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* and his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* also and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and I \w plagued|strong="H5062"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, according to that \w which|strong="H0834"\w* I \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them: and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* I brought you \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

And I \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and ye \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; and the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* with \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* unto the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

And when they \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w darkness|strong="H3990"\w* between you and the \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* upon them, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* them; and your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* what I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and ye \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* a \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w season|strong="H3117"\w*.

And I \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* you into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*; and they \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with you: and I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that ye might \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and I \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you.

Then \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w warred|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* to \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* you:

But I \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*; therefore he \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* you \w still|strong="H1288"\w*: so I \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* you out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And ye went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*: and the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against you, the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Girgashites|strong="H1622"\w*, the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*; and I \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* the \w hornet|strong="H6880"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, which drave them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, \add even\add* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*; \add but\add* not with thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, nor with thy \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*.

And I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* for which ye did not \w labour|strong="H3021"\w*, and \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which ye \w built|strong="H1129"\w* not, and ye \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in them; of the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* and \w oliveyards|strong="H2132"\w* which ye \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* not do ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

¶ Now therefore \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him in \w sincerity|strong="H8549"\w* and in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*: and put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* which your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w flood|strong="H5104"\w*, and in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And if it seem \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* unto \w you|strong="H4310"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w whom|strong="H5869"\w* ye will \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*; whether the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* which your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* that \add were\add* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w flood|strong="H5104"\w*, or the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, in whose \w land|strong="H0776"\w* ye \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*: but as for me and my \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, we will \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, God \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* that we should \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*;

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he \add it is\add* that brought us \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*, and which \w did|strong="H6213"\w* those \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* in our \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w* us in all the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* wherein we \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, and among all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w through|strong="H7130"\w* whom we \w passed|strong="H5674"\w*:

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* drave \w out|strong="H1644"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, even the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \add therefore\add* will we also \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; for he \add is\add* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Ye \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he \add is\add* an \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; he \add is\add* a \w jealous|strong="H7072"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*; he will not \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* your \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* nor your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 24.19 \ft holy God: Heb. holy Gods\f*

If ye \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, then he will \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* and do you \w hurt|strong="H7489"\w*, and \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* you, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that he hath done you \w good|strong="H3190"\w*.
And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, Nay; but we will \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Ye \add are\add* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* against yourselves that ye have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* you the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him. And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add We are\add* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*.

Now therefore put \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, \add said he\add*, the \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* which \add are\add* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you, and \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will we \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*, and his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* will we \w obey|strong="H8085"\w*.

So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* them a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* and an \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w* in \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and set it \w up|strong="H6965"\w* there under an \w oak|strong="H0427"\w*, that \add was\add* by the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Behold, this \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* shall be a \w witness|strong="H5713"\w* unto us; for it hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* all the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto us: it shall be therefore a \w witness|strong="H5713"\w* unto you, lest ye \w deny|strong="H3584"\w* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w depart|strong="H7971"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass \w after|strong="H0310"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, that \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \add being\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*.

And they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* in \w Timnath-serah|strong="H8556"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w* of the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Gaash|strong="H1608"\w*.

And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* that \w overlived|strong="H0748"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and which had \w known|strong="H3045"\w* all the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.  +  r 24.31  t overlived…: Heb. prolonged their days after Joshua *

¶ And the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* they in \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, in a \w parcel|strong="H2513"\w* of \w ground|strong="H7704"\w* which \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hamor|strong="H2544"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* for an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* pieces of \w silver|strong="H7192"\w*: and it became the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.\f + \fr 24.32 \ft pieces…: or, lambs\f*

And \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*; and they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in a \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* \add that pertained to\add* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, which was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.
